Package net.grinder.console.swingui

Swing implementation of the console.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
FileTree.Node Allows us to treat FileNodes and BufferNodes polymorphically.
LookAndFeel.Listener Listeners implement this to learn about LAF changes.
SwingDispatcherFactory Factory for dynamic proxies that dispatch work in the Swing thread.
Table.TableModel Interface for our extended TableModel.
 

Class Summary
BufferTreeModel Simple TreeModel that lists buffers.
Colours Some standard colours.
CompositeTreeModel TreeModel that combines other tree models.
ConsoleUI Swing UI for console.
CumulativeStatisticsTableModel Table model for cumulative statistics table.
CustomAction Customised Action.
CustomJButton Customised JButton.
DynamicStatisticsTableModel Abstract table model for statistics tables.
Editor Text editor.
Editor.TextSourceFactory Factory for TextSources that can be used with Editor.
EditorControls Builds a panel containing status information and controls for the editor.
ErrorDialogHandler Wrap up all the machinery used to show an error dialog.
FileTree Panel containing buffer list and file tree.
FileTreeModel TreeModel that walks file system.
FrameBounds Class that records and restores the console frame's size and location from properties.
Graph This class is used graphically show statistics.
IntegerField JTextField that only accepts integers within a particular range.
JOptionPaneDialog JDialog that is more useful than that returned by JOptionPane.createDialog().
LabelledGraph This class is used graphically show statistics.
LookAndFeel Manage Look and Feel.
LookAndFeel.ComponentListener LookAndFeel.Listener that does the basic post-LAF change refreshing of a Component.
MnemonicHeuristics Automatically set mnemonics for all AbstractButtons in a ContainerListener.
OptionalConfirmDialog Optional confirmation dialogs.
OptionsDialogHandler Wrap up all the machinery used to show the options dialog.
ProcessStatusTableModel TableModel for the process status table.
SampleStatisticsTableModel TableModel for the sample statistics table.
SamplingControlPanel Panel containing sampling controls.
SwingDispatcherFactoryImplementation Factory for dynamic proxies that dispatch work in the Swing thread.
Table A read-only JTable that works in conjunction with an extended TableModel specifies some cell rendering.
TeeAction Composite Action which fans out events to two delegates.
TestGraphPanel A panel of test graphs.
 

Package net.grinder.console.swingui Description

Swing implementation of the console.
